abstract: Simone Biles wins all-around title at world gymnastics championships.
lead_paragraph: Simone Biles won her third straight world gymnastics title, besting Gabrielle Douglas, the reigning Olympic champion and a fellow American, in the all-around final in Glasgow.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Gymnastics; U.S. Women Finish 1-2 in All-Around

snippet: Simone Biles won her third straight world gymnastics title, besting Gabrielle Douglas, the reigning Olympic champion and a fellow American, in the all-around final in Glasgow.
